node.content-desc: Uber Driver Catches Her BF Cheating When She Drives His Sidechick To His Apartment

This has got to be the greatest cheating bust of all time. An Uber driver discovered her boyfriend had a side piece when she dropped a woman off at her man's apartment! We've got the unbelievable details.
in the internet age, but modern technology also makes it easy to bust those who
. An Uber driver discovered her man had a sidechick when she picked up a rider at the airport and drove the woman to her own boyfriend's apartment! A 24-year-old Twitter user named
told the whole story in a massive outburst of tweets that shared the entire ordeal!
So I drive for uber why I just pick this girl up and drop her off to a dick appointment and the dick appointment was my mans house

She claims that her boyfriend told her he was flying to New York to see his sick mother in the hospital and was going to be out of town. The user now affectionately referred to as #Uberbae says that he had his luggage packed when she stayed over the night before. They even left his apartment at the same time the next morning and he drove away in the direction of their local airport. Then she later clocked on as an Uber driver and one of her pickups was at the airport and it was a woman who had flown in to
, who she hadn't seen in ages.
We parted ways earlier this morning from his apartment he got in his car I got in mine he drove off like he was going to the airport
fast forward to an hour ago I pick a girl up at the airport she puts the apartment complex in the gps she said she's here to visit
fast forward to an hour ago I pick a girl up at the airport she puts the apartment complex in the gps she said she's here to visit
Her boyfriend and shes so excited She hasn't seen him in forever blah blah blah I'm relating I'm like yeah my man just left out of town
Anyways fast forward to us pulling up to the gate at the apartment complex I'm like my boyfriend lives out here
She's like ok I got the number at this point I'm like ok we counting the building numbers down as we are riding through the buildings
She's like ok I got the number at this point I'm like ok we counting the building numbers down as we are riding through the buildings
my stomach starts to drop as we get closer to a familiar building and I see his car outside at this point I'm like
